McCormick Place Convention Center, Chicago – Room 1520

[icon tag="span" class="fa fa-map-marker" fontsize="14px"] 2345 South Place Street, Chicago, CH 123456[/icon]

The conference will be organized on the large conference center which can accomodate ~1000 attendees. We have prepared the best possible catering service which can be adjusted to your needs.

We recommend to book your hotel around month before the conference – this time period will guarantee a good selection of the hotel rooms. Later there can be a problem with booking a good hotel rooms so don’t wait!. Please read our hotel and city guide.
